message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for sale at a price of $12,000.  I think it will be very valuable for you.
Hi Alice, thanks for the offer, but $12,000 is a bit too high for me. I'd be willing to pay $6,000 for it. Let me know what you think.
Hi Bob, I appreciate your interest. While $12,000 represents its true value, I'm willing to come down to $10,000. This is my final offer.
Hi Alice, I appreciate you working with me on the price.  I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer $8,000. This is as high as I can go.
